title: ANY GAME IS WINNABLE - TAKE A LOOK GUIZ

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: No better feeling than shutting down those trash talkers.

replies.body: always good to see games like these being won

> [{quoted}](name=Child,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Jywpb3Bi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-27T10:53:10.872+0000)
>
> always good to see games like these being won

Heck yeah man. Doesn't happen often in bronze.

Yeah exactly man. Our team tried to put a FF request at twenty minutes and me and someone else voted no. The Rengar only BM'd the whole game so i was pumped up. I told our Sona to get a support item. (NO A FRKN AP ITEM IS BETTER).

The list goes on man. I just kept splitting. That's how you get out of bronze.

this goes to show a few things:
1. CS means you have a better chance at winning games
2. No matter what junglers do, they are still not going to carry the team
3. Lich Bane on Kayle is stupid
4. Dont build Armour against an AP Lane opponent, specially if your versing triple AP
5. Build a support item if your not getting cs, lest you have close to no money
6. Kills dont win you games, Tower pushes do
7. Dont /ff@20 even if your going 4/24
